title: kandha kalpaka
sahitya:
kandA karpaka taruvE nI endan cintAkulam I rtaruL shiva guruvE



anupallavi



nandA tiruvODun nallaruL shirandE en santAnamum tazhaittida arul shurandE



caraNam



endAi unakkiNai yAr ulagil bhakta mandArA koDaiyil ulaganaittum tandAL
kOmaLa shyAmaLAngi umai maindA kavi kunjaradAsanukkuganda
